data.text: Ah, Spe-chan's race should be wrapping up right about now!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>Ah, Spe-chan's race should be wrapping up right about now!

data.text: Are you fine not checking the results…?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Are you fine not checking the results…?

data.text: ……Yeah, it's fine.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>……Yeah, it's fine.

data.text: Besides, I already know without seeing it.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Besides, I already know without seeing it.

data.text:
Ehehe…… you really believe in Spe-chan, 
don't you?! And Trainer-san too!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe…… you really believe in Spe-chan, 
<story>don't you?! And Trainer-san too!

data.text:
I heard about it from Trainer-san, 
that you were fine without them seeing you off.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>I heard about it from Trainer-san, 
<story>that you were fine without them seeing you off.

data.text:
Yeah, I wanted them to watch Spe-chan's race. 
Because I want her to take hold of that dream, without fail.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, I wanted them to watch Spe-chan's race. 
<story>Because I want her to take hold of that dream, without fail.

data.text: We're also expecting big things from Suzuka's efforts!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>We're also expecting big things from Suzuka's efforts!

data.text: We're all cheering for you……!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>We're all cheering for you……!

data.text:
Yeah, I look forward to that "scenery" 
that I've never seen before.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, I look forward to that "scenery" 
<story>that I've never seen before.

data.text:
Special Week, in a fierce battle to the finish, outlasts the 
Senior grade's most preeminent stayer, Mejiro Bright!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Special Week, in a fierce battle to the finish, outlasts the 
<story>Senior grade's most preeminent stayer, Mejiro Bright!

data.text:
This is the strength of the Derby Uma Musume! 
At last, the next grand battle will be at the [Spring Tenno Sho]!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>This is the strength of the Derby Uma Musume! 
<story>At last, the next grand battle will be at the [Spring Tenno Sho]!

data.text:
Mejiro Bright was doing great as usual but, the title of "Golden 
Generation's" Derby Uma Musume isn't for show!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed:
<story>Mejiro Bright was doing great as usual but, the title of "Golden 
<story>Generation's" Derby Uma Musume isn't for show!

data.text:
I've got really high hopes for Special Week's 
run during the [Spring Tenno Sho]!
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed:
<story>I've got really high hopes for Special Week's 
<story>run during the [Spring Tenno Sho]!

data.text: ……Bright.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>……Bright.

data.text: Haa…… haa…… fuu～……
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Haa…… haa…… fuu～……

data.text:
Intentionally lifting your legs higher, seems 
to be good stimulation for the quads…… Yeah, we 
should add this to Bright's training too.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Intentionally lifting your legs higher, seems 
<story>to be good stimulation for the quads…… Yeah, we 
<story>should add this to Bright's training too.

data.text: Ryan-oneesama……
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>Ryan-oneesama……

data.text: Oh, Bright……? Seeing you during self-training is pretty unusual.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Oh, Bright……? Seeing you during self-training is pretty unusual.

data.text:
I happened to spot Ryan-oneesama 
heading out, so I decided to follow.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>I happened to spot Ryan-oneesama 
<story>heading out, so I decided to follow.

data.text: ……If it's alright, I thought I'd like to watch your training.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>……If it's alright, I thought I'd like to watch your training.

data.text: Bright…… Yeah, how about running together?
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Bright…… Yeah, how about running together?

data.text: Haaa……! Haa…… haa……
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Haaa……! Haa…… haa……

data.text: Haa……… haaa……
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>Haa……… haaa……

data.text: Alright…… just like this, let's do one more!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Alright…… just like this, let's do one more!

data.text: Haa…… haa……
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>Haa…… haa……

data.text:
Bright……! If you don't work 
harder now, you'll come to regret―
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Bright……! If you don't work 
<story>harder now, you'll come to regret―

data.text: …… haa…… haaa……
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>…… haa…… haaa……

data.text: Ah…… I-I'm sorry…… I just……
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Ah…… I-I'm sorry…… I just……

data.text: ……have you caught your breath now?
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>……have you caught your breath now?

data.text: Yes…… I apologize……
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>Yes…… I apologize……

data.text: Ah, don't apologize……! I was the one in the wrong……
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Ah, don't apologize……! I was the one in the wrong……

data.text:
…… Really…… I'm sorry. I was just 
frustrated, because Bright lost……
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>…… Really…… I'm sorry. I was just 
<story>frustrated, because Bright lost……

data.text:
Bright, I've been watching over you since you were small so, 
while I do treat you as special, there's more to it than that……
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Bright, I've been watching over you since you were small so, 
<story>while I do treat you as special, there's more to it than that……

data.text: I feel like… I've been pushing my feelings on to you……
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>I feel like… I've been pushing my feelings on to you……

data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>………

data.text: Bright seems like she's really similar to me.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Bright seems like she's really similar to me.

data.text:
Having closing power to be proud of, having high expectations 
from people around you, but often one step short……
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Having closing power to be proud of, having high expectations 
<story>from people around you, but often one step short……

data.text:
While watching Ines and Oguri-san, 
and then McQueen, making my goal to be like them.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>While watching Ines and Oguri-san, 
<story>and then McQueen, making my goal to be like them.

data.text:
That's why, when I see Bright, I get as frustrated 
as if I'm seeing myself, not wanting you to 
go through the same things I did……
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>That's why, when I see Bright, I get as frustrated 
<story>as if I'm seeing myself, not wanting you to 
<story>go through the same things I did……

data.text: Ryan-oneesama……
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>Ryan-oneesama……

data.text:
Ah, Ahaha…… what the heck am I 
even saying? Bright is Bright after all.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Ah, Ahaha…… what the heck am I 
<story>even saying? Bright is Bright after all.

data.text:
If it's like this, it's more like I'm 
just pushing my pride and dreams on to you……
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>If it's like this, it's more like I'm 
<story>just pushing my pride and dreams on to you……

data.text: ……If what you say is true, then I feel nothing but joy instead.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>……If what you say is true, then I feel nothing but joy instead.

data.text: Eh……?
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Eh……?

data.text:
If it seems like my running is that similar to yours then, that 
is just proof of how genuine your feelings and expectations are.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>If it seems like my running is that similar to yours then, that 
<story>is just proof of how genuine your feelings and expectations are.

data.text:
For someone like Ryan-oneesama who has supported 
me whole-heartedly, I've always wanted those 
feelings to be rewarded.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>For someone like Ryan-oneesama who has supported 
<story>me whole-heartedly, I've always wanted those 
<story>feelings to be rewarded.

data.text:
As part of the Mejiro Family, while aiming for 
consecutive [Spring Tenno Sho] victories, more 
than that I want to win for Ryan-oneesama……
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>As part of the Mejiro Family, while aiming for 
<story>consecutive [Spring Tenno Sho] victories, more 
<story>than that I want to win for Ryan-oneesama……

data.text:
If you say that Ryan-oneesama is pushing 
that dream on to me then, I will gladly carry that with me.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>If you say that Ryan-oneesama is pushing 
<story>that dream on to me then, I will gladly carry that with me.

data.text: Bright……
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Bright……

data.text:
Well then, I can start running again now～. 
Without going easy on me, please continue the strict training.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>Well then, I can start running again now～. 
<story>Without going easy on me, please continue the strict training.

data.text:
Together we'll accomplish consecutive 
victories at the [Spring Tenno Sho].
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>Together we'll accomplish consecutive 
<story>victories at the [Spring Tenno Sho].

data.text: ……Yeah, got it.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>……Yeah, got it.

data.text:
I'll support you with everything I've got. 
I'll make sure you win……!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>I'll support you with everything I've got. 
<story>I'll make sure you win……!
